snippet.title: Strikers Edge E3 Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
http://strikersedgegame.com

Follow the development:
Twitter: http://twitter.com/funpunchgames
Twitch: http://twitch.com/funpunch
Tumblr: http://funpunch.tumblr.com
Facebook: http://fb.com/funpunchgames

Strikers Edge is an intense, action-packed, online multiplayer ranged combat game, where you play as an ancient warrior, soon on PC and PS4!

Play online or localy as one of eight unique strikers across 4 different arenas. Climb the ranked online ladder, achieve greatness and be the top striker!

1 versus 1 and 2 versus 2 game modes offer endless hours of fun, either your friends are on the other side of the world, via online mode, or right there with you on your couch.

Each of the 8 strikers offers a different weapon, set of abilities, stats and playstyle. Which one will you choose and master?

Coming May 2017 to PC and PS4.
